meanings.definition: Not pleasant to taste or eat.
meanings.sent1: The unpalatable food made me grimace.
meanings.sent2: The chef refused to serve the unpalatable dish.
meanings.sent3: The unpalatable broccoli stared back at me from the plate.
meanings.sent4: The unpalatable truth was hard to swallow.
meanings.sent5: The unpalatable taste lingered in my mouth long after I ate.

meanings.sent1: The unpalatable decision left everyone in shock.
meanings.sent2: The unpalatable news spread quickly through the town.
meanings.sent3: His unpalatable jokes always made us groan.
meanings.sent4: The unpalatable reality of the situation hit me hard.
meanings.sent5: The unpalatable behavior of the child was hard to ignore.
